name: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
description:
G.I Joe is a side-scrolling action game where you can select 3 out of a possible 5 characters to complete a mission.

Each level is in three main parts: The fight into the mission zone, the mission zone, and the escape from the mission zone. The stages where you fight into and escape from the mission zone are straightforward action – just fight your way to the end of the stage, and defeat the stage boss.

The actual mission zone is a maze, where the object is to place bombs at pre-determined locations, then find and use the exit. The mazes start out easy with the first one being only two screens high and 4 long. Level 6 is 7 by 8 for a total of 56 screens.

Characters:

Duke (Tiger Force first sergeant/squad leader), Rock & Roll (gatling gunner), Capt. Grid-Iron (hand-to-hand combat specialist), Blizzard (arctic attack soldier), Snake Eyes (commando)

The level 1 escape mission
The boss at the end of the level 1 escape mission -- Range Viper
The entry mission for the second level
The boss at the end of the second level entry mission -- Cobra Sea Ray
In the maze portion of the second level, you can commandeer enemy equipment such as this personal helicopter
The boss for the second level maze mission -- a trio of Cobra Buzz Boars
The escape mission for the second level, showcasing the game's pedigree as a true platformer, complete with conveyor belts
The entry mission for the third level; this elevator takes you deep into a sewer
In this maze mission, you can commandeer a Buzz Boar and climb walls or ride along ceilings
The boss at the end of this maze is simply a large AI computer
The boss at the end of the level 3 escape mission is an Overlord
This is the level 4 entry mission, hiking up the mountain
Later in the level 4 entry mission, you get a Cobra pogo jumping machine
The boss at the end of the level 4 entry mission -- a Cobra A.G.P.
Fighting through the level 4 maze to plant bombs
The boss at the end of the level 4 maze -- Road Pig
The boss at the end of the level 4 escape mission -- Voltar
The entry mission for level 5 -- in the desert fighting a helicopter
The boss and the end of the level 5 entry mission -- a Cobra Bugg
A major Cobra boss -- Golobulus
A fearsome Cobra boss -- Destro
